name: Player VS AI
description:
A simple tennis game. I'm sorry for the poor quality of the game but if you download the game the quality will be much better !!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controlls:

  • to serv you can chose betwne flat serv and kick serv. 
  • to make a flat serv you press R.
  • to make a kick serv you press T.
  • and then you use the arrowkeays or A and D to move the green dot.
  • you have to shot options to and they are top spin shot and flat shot.
  • to make a top spin shot you press Q.
  • to make a flat shot you press E.
  • Ten you use the arrowkeays or A and D to move the green dot.
  • And obviously can you pause the game when you press ESC button!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

NOTE: The Ai are really good and hard to beat in this game!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
